scripts.install-precommit:
if [ -f .git/hooks/pre-commit ]; then echo 'Not overwriting .git/hooks/pre-commit'; else echo '#!/bin/sh
yarn run precommit' > .git/hooks/pre-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit; echo 'Added .git/hooks/pre-commit'; fi
scripts.lint-fix: yarn prettier --write . && yarn tsc --noEmit && yarn eslint --ext .js,.ts,.tsx . --fix
scripts.lint-precommit: if [[ -n $(git ls-files . --exclude-standard --others --modified) && $GIT_INDEX_FILE != '.git/index' ]]; then yarn run lint; else (yarn run lint-fix && git add -A); fi;
